SYSTEM: Master_I_AI_Terminology_in_ontologies_28-10-09%284%29.pdf: Página 65
65
Recommended papers 
Terminology and ontologies, October 2009
• Read three papers from the six proposed in the wiki. Comment on the ideas 
proposed and give your opinion in your own words.
• Van Assem, Malaisé, Miles & Schreiber: “A method to convert a thesaurus 
to SKOS”. http://www.cs.vu.nl/~guus/papers/Assem06b.pdf
• Van Assem, Menken, Schreiber, Wielemaker & Wielinga: “A method for 
converting thesauri to RDF/OWL
• http://www.cs.vu.nl/~guus/papers/Assem04a.pdf
• Lauser, Sini, Lian, Keizer and Katz
• ftp://ftp.fao.org/docrep/fao/009/ah801e/ah801e00.pdf
• Campbell, Oliver, Packman & Shortliffe “Representing thoughts, words and 
things in UMLS.
• http://www.pubmedcentral.nih.gov/articlerender.fcgi?artid=61323
speaker: SYSTEM
